summary: A ruthless college student resorts to murder in an attempt to marry an heiress.
cast: Robert Wagner|Jeffrey Hunter|Virginia Leith|Joanne Woodward|Mary Astor|George Macready|Robert Quarry|Howard Petrie|Bill Walker|Molly McCart|Marlene Felton|Albert Cavens|Robert Ivers|Mickey Martin|Joe McGuinn|Edwin Rochelle|Jack Stoney
keywords: murder of a pregnant woman|based on novel|murder|ambition|pushed from height
title: Un beso antes de morir
